originalText.text:
Wow, the food was so good that it just melted in my mouth. The service was 10 starts. Thank you, Jessica. Hopefully, you have a great time at the Taylor Swift concert.
What a great little secret this restaurant is. Even with 15 seats.
This was my first time having Omakase, and after this experience, I'm not sure I could go back to regular spring rolls. ðŸ˜…

originalText.text: Sushi Lin is fairly new to West Village area. Me and my friend went for the 18 course omakase  and we enjoyed every bite. The omakase experience was a symphony of flavors. Each dish, a revelation, showcased the chef's artistic prowess and deep understanding of ingredients. From the red snapper to homemade pudding, every bite was a crescendo of taste, expertly curated and beautifully presented. The chef's selection unfolded like a narrative, weaving together delicate nuances and bold statements. The omakase journey wasn't just a meal; it was a sensory expedition that left an indelible mark, a testament to the chef's commitment to elevating the art of dining.

originalText.text: This sushi restaurant has rightfully earned a five-star rating from me. Firstly, the freshness of the seafood is unparalleled, each bite exuding the crispness of the sea. Secondly, the chefs' (Che Xie) masterful skills turn every piece of sushi into a work of art, both delicious and visually stunning. The service is another highlight, consistently maintaining an efficient and friendly demeanor. The ambiance is elegant, creating a tasteful dining atmosphere. Overall, this sushi restaurant seamlessly combines exceptional ingredients, craftsmanship, and service to create a perfect feast of flavors and enjoyment!

originalText.text:
Highly recommend this Omakase!!!
The ambiance here is refined yet unpretentious, creating the perfect backdrop for the culinary spectacle that unfolds. The minimalist decor and intimate setting allow the focus to remain on the star of the showâ€”the food. The chefs' meticulous attention to detail is reflected not only in the presentation of each course but also in the carefully selected tableware and the seamless service that enhances the overall dining experience.Each dish is a harmonious blend of tradition and innovation, paying homage to Japanese culinary heritage while pushing the boundaries of contemporary cuisine. From the delicate and melt-in-your-mouth sashimi to the perfectly seasoned and expertly grilled sushi, every bite is a revelation.
But please reserve a seat on Resy in advance.

originalText.text:
Came here to get a full course of their Omakase for $125 (17 courses), the menu was a celebration of creativity and taste. Each dish was delicious. My most favorite was Salmon with salted tomato. Plus the knowledgeable staff added an extra layer of enjoyment to my Omakase experience. Love their amazing service !!

I definitely come back.
